name: Cells (GamingNight)
description:
For this Ludum Dare entry, we propose a turn-based management game. The purpose is to create, manipulate, and keep cybernetic organs alive.

Controls: mouse/WASD/arrows to move in the map, scroll wheel to zoom, right click to revert actions of the turn.

POST-JAM Version: given the unanimous feedbacks, we brought a post-jam version that now displays the upcoming level of virus.

Thanks for playing!
